title: Dashlight
description: A screen to display information from my car's computer.
fullDescription: This project involved the design of a PCB-based microcontroller to read information from my car's OBD2 port and make that information available on a 7-segment display. Dashlight presented challenges such as PCB design, interface with various peripherals, real-time communications, and hardware management. Although it may not be perfect, it's still installed in my car so I can read out information like gas mileage, temperature, and more.
